混合器；搅拌器；[电子] 混频器
调酒术；制备混合饮料的手艺

word_group.brief_definition: 祸福兼有的境遇；有利亦有弊的事物
混合效应；多种媒介演出
成败兼有；好运厄运相伴
混合情绪；交集感情；混杂的情感

bilingual.source: The chef prepared a mixed salad for the guests.
bilingual.target: 厨师为客人准备了一份混合的沙拉。

bilingual.source: She has mixed feelings about moving to a new city.
bilingual.target: 她对搬到新城市有混合的感受。

bilingual.source: The results of the experiment were mixed and inconclusive.
bilingual.target: 实验结果是混合的，没有定论。

bilingual.source: They listened to a mixed playlist of old and new songs.
bilingual.target: 他们听了一份混合的老歌和新歌播放列表。

bilingual.source: The classroom had a mixed group of students from different backgrounds.
bilingual.target: 教室里有一群来自不同背景的混合的学生。

bilingual.source: A tone is the hue mixed with true gray.
bilingual.target: 深色是纯色与灰色混合的产物。

bilingual.source: The eco-car plan has had a mixed reception.
bilingual.target: 环保车的计划是个混合的接收平台。

bilingual.source: The eco - car plan has had a mixed reception.
bilingual.target: 环保车的计划是个混合的接收平台.

bilingual.source: A duct that admits air to be mixed with fuel.
bilingual.target: 一种能让空气和燃料混合的管道，如煤气管。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me, but that sounds like a mixed message.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，但您这意思有点混乱呀。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I feel that these choices send mixed messages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得这些选择发出的讯息很混乱。

yingyinNormal.en: I have mixed feelings about that, dad. Do you have mixed feelings about a hug? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关于这个，我心情有点复杂。你对一个拥抱也会心情复杂吗？会。

yingyinNormal.en: And they're grown from human DNA mixed with the DNA of the natives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们是人类DNA和当地土著DNA的结合产物。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you planning on kidnapping a woman? Sarcasm? Yes, but mixed with genuine concern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你打算绑架一个女人吗？讽刺吗？对，但也包含真诚的关心。

yingyinNormal.en: When those two markets mixed, something happens. And that thing is usually not very good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两者混在一起时，就会有事情发生，通常都是不好的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, he'll be okay once the women are mixed into the crowd. He only has a problem when they're one-on-one and smell nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要女人待在人群里，他就应该没事儿，只有当跟女人一对一，并且那人闻起来很香时，他才会出问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. There they are. You know, we have a couple of mixed families in the neighborhood, so I thought I'd invite them over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们到了，你知道，我们的邻居有几对混杂的家庭，所以我就邀请他们过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Long story short, today that woman travels the world with a semi professional basketball player and two beautiful mixed race babies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长话短说，现在这个女人和一个半职业篮球选手周游世界，还生了两个漂亮的混血宝宝。

yingyinNormal.en: The right sleeve of your jacket, plus the formaldehyde mixed with your cologne and your complete inability to stop looking at your watch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你夹克的右袖子。而且你的古龙水混着福尔马林的味道，还有你完全无法忍住不看表。

yingyinNormal.en: All of them mixed together, all of them learning from one another. You're saying Vision isn't just the stone? I'm saying that if we take out the stone there's still a whole lot of Vision left. Perhaps the best parts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们混在了一起，彼此学习。你是说幻视并不只是那块宝石？我是说如果我们取出宝石还剩下不少的幻视。或许还是最好的部分。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 混合的；搀和的；混杂的；复杂的；好坏兼有的；不同种族（或阶层）混合的；男女混合的
n. 混合物；混合品；混合；拌和；心情混杂；具有多种品性和特点的人；混合气；混合音栓

word_family.mean: v. 使混合；拌和；交往；配制；相处；拌成；交际；混录；并置；能相混合

sense_info_list.en: including many different types of people or things

examination_example.sentence: Equally crucial is lower-tech research into basics such as crop rotation and <highlight>mixed</highlight> farming of animals and plants on small farms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样重要的是对基础设施的低技术研究，如在小农场进行轮作和动植物混合种植。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 混合的；搀和的；混杂的；复杂的；好坏兼有的；不同种族（或阶层）混合的；男女混合的
n. 混合物；混合品；混合；拌和；心情混杂；具有多种品性和特点的人；混合气；混合音栓

examination_example.sentence: Scientists have tried to tap Internet donors, too, with <highlight>mixed</highlight> success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们也曾尝试利用互联网捐助者，但结果喜忧参半。

examination_example.sentence: Some of the surveys included only college students; others were done with a <highlight>mixed</highlight>-age population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些调查只包括大学生; 另一些调查则是针对混合年龄人群进行的。

examination_example.sentence: But respondents had decidedly <highlight>mixed</highlight> feelings about what actions make for a better life in current economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对于在当前经济形势下，什么样的行动能让生活变得更好，受访者的感受显然是复杂的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
